In study investigator aim increase effectiveness , cost effectiveness , acceptability practice family population-based R/R introducing strong private-public collaboration maximize health information technology allow practice interface Colorado 's Immunization Services System ( CIIS ) . Two real-world approach compare : one approach provide primary care practice tool conduct recall educational intervention . Determining method effective reach child compare cost provide data critical guiding future national effort assure child enter school fully vaccinate .
